ps1.5:5.4: Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho—

ps1.5:6.4: ajjhattavuṭṭhānā cattāro vimokkhā, bahiddhāvuṭṭhānā cattāro vimokkhā, dubhato vuṭṭhānā cattāro vimokkhā;
ps1.5:6.5: ajjhattavuṭṭhānānaṃ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā, bahiddhāvuṭṭhānānaṃ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā, dubhato vuṭṭhānānaṃ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā;
ps1.5:6.6: ajjhattavuṭṭhānapaṭippassaddhī cattāro vimokkhā, bahiddhāvuṭṭhānapaṭippassaddhī cattāro vimokkhā, dubhato vuṭṭhānapaṭippassaddhī cattāro vimokkhā;
ps1.5:6.7: rūpī rūpāni passatīti vimokkho, ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti vimokkho, subhaṃ teva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho;
ps1.5:6.8: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti vimokkho, viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti vimokkho, ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti vimokkho;
ps1.5:6.16: nirāmisānirāmisataro vimokkho, paṇihito vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho, paṇihitappaṭippassaddhi vimokkho;

ps1.5:20.2: Sotāpattimaggassa sotāpattiphalaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggassa sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmimaggassa anāgāmiphalaṃ, arahattamaggassa arahattaphalaṃ—
ps1.5:21.3: Idhekacco ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ nīlanimittaṃ manasikaroti, nīlasaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:21.4: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karoti, sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:21.5: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpetvā bahiddhā nīlanimitte cittaṃ upasaṃharati, nīlasaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:21.6: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karoti, sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:21.7: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:21.9: “ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca ubhayamidaṃ rūpan”ti, rūpasaññī hoti.
ps1.5:21.15: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karoti, sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpeti.

ps1.5:21.17: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karoti, sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṃ avatthāpeti.

ps1.5:22.1: Kathaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti—

ps1.5:22.13: odātanimittaṃ na manasikaroti, odātasaññaṃ na paṭilabhati;

ps1.5:23.3: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ.
ps1.5:23.4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
ps1.5:23.12: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati … pe …
ps1.5:24.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā “ananto ākāso”ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:25.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma “anantaṃ viññāṇan”ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:26.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma “natthi kiñcī”ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—

ps1.5:52.4: Aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.6: Dukkhānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ sukhato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.8: Anattānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ attato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.10: Nibbidānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ nandiyā sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.12: Virāgānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ rāgato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.14: Nirodhānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ samudayato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.16: Paṭinissaggānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ ādānato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—

ps1.5:52.20: Appaṇihitānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṇidhiyā sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.22: Suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.24: Evaṃ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti, dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.

ps1.5:53.4: rūpe suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:53.6: Evaṃ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti, dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.

ps1.5:54.11: jarāmaraṇe suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—

ps1.5:65.1: Yañca aniccānupassanañāṇaṃ, yañca anattānupassanañāṇaṃ, yañca animittānupassanañāṇaṃ, yañca suññatānupassanañāṇaṃ—
ps1.5:65.4: Yañca dukkhānupassanañāṇaṃ, yaṃ ca nibbidānupassanañāṇaṃ, yañca virāgānupassanañāṇaṃ, yañca appaṇihitānupassanañāṇaṃ—
ps1.5:67.1: Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṃvattanti.
ps1.5:67.2: Sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato samanupassanatāya animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbasaṅkhāresu manosamuttejanatāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbadhamme parato samanupassanatāya suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya—
ps1.5:68.4: Aniccato manasikaroto khayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhanti, dukkhato manasikaroto bhayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhanti, anattato manasikaroto suññato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhanti.
ps1.5:69.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṃ bahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti?
ps1.5:69.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṃ bahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti?
ps1.5:69.3: Anattato manasikaroto kiṃ bahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti?
ps1.5:71.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hoti, bhāvanāya katindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:71.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hoti, bhāvanāya katindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:71.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hoti, bhāvanāya katindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:71.4: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa saddhindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hoti.
ps1.5:71.5: Bhāvanāya cattārindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:71.9: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa samādhindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hoti.

ps1.5:71.14: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa paññindriyaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ hoti.

ps1.5:76.9: Jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti—
ps1.5:76.11: “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāyāti—
ps1.5:76.13: Yo cāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:76.21: Evaṃ ime tayo puggalā saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā.
ps1.5:77.7: Evaṃ ime tayo puggalā samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī.
ps1.5:78.7: Evaṃ ime tayo puggalā paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:79.1: Yo cāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, evaṃ siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:79.2: Yo cāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, siyā ime tayo puggalā … pe … aññoyeva saddhāvimutto, añño kāyasakkhī, añño diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:80.9: Yo cāyaṃ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, evaṃ siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:80.10: Aññoyeva saddhāvimutto, añño kāyasakkhī, añño diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:81.1: Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhati;
ps1.5:81.4: Cattārindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.5:81.5: Saddhindriyassa vasena catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.5:81.6: Ye hi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhanti, sabbe te saddhānusārino.
ps1.5:82.1: Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikataṃ hoti;
ps1.5:82.4: Cattārindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.5:82.5: Saddhindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.5:82.6: Yehi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikatā, sabbe te saddhāvimuttā.

ps1.5:89.1: Ye hi keci nekkhammaṃ bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā, adhigatā vā adhigacchanti vā adhigamissanti vā, pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, paṭiladdhā vā paṭilabhanti vā paṭilabhissanti vā, paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā, sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā, phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā, vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:91.8: ye hi keci aṭṭha vimokkhe bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā, adhigatā vā adhigacchanti vā adhigamissanti vā, pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, paṭiladdhā vā paṭilabhanti vā paṭilabhissanti vā, paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā, sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā, phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā, vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:92.1: Ye hi keci catasso paṭisambhidā pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā … pe …
ps1.5:92.3: sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:93.1: Ye hi keci tisso vijjā paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā … pe …
ps1.5:93.3: sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:94.1: Ye hi keci tisso sikkhā sikkhitā vā sikkhanti vā sikkhissanti vā, sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā, phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā, vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:95.1: Ye hi keci dukkhaṃ parijānanti samudayaṃ pajahanti nirodhaṃ sacchikaronti maggaṃ bhāventi, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:96.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṃ pahānappaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:96.7: Imehi catūhākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimutto, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:97.3: Navahākārehi saccappaṭivedho hoti, navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:97.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṃ pahānappaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:97.5: Abhiññāpaṭivedho ca sabbadhammānaṃ, pariññāpaṭivedho ca sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ, pahānappaṭivedho ca sabbākusalānaṃ, bhāvanāpaṭivedho ca catunnaṃ maggānaṃ, sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho ca nirodhassa.
ps1.5:97.7: Imehi navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimutto, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:100.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṃ bahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti?
ps1.5:100.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṃ bahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti?
ps1.5:100.3: Anattato manasikaroto kiṃ bahulaṃ cittaṃ hoti?
ps1.5:101.1: Aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo katamaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati?
ps1.5:101.2: Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo katamaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati?
ps1.5:101.3: Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo katamaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati?
ps1.5:101.4: Aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:101.5: Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:101.6: Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo suññataṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:102.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:102.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:102.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:103.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:103.2: Bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:103.6: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:103.7: Bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:103.11: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:103.12: Bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:104.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakāle katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, kenaṭṭhena paṭivedho?
ps1.5:104.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakāle katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, kenaṭṭhena paṭivedho?
ps1.5:104.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakāle katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya kativimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, kenaṭṭhena paṭivedho?
ps1.5:105.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakālepi animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, dassanaṭṭhena paṭivedho, evaṃ paṭivijjhantopi bhāveti, bhāventopi paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:105.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakālepi appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, dassanaṭṭhena paṭivedho, evaṃ paṭivijjhantopi bhāveti, bhāventopi paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:105.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakālepi suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, dassanaṭṭhena paṭivedho, evaṃ paṭivijjhantopi bhāveti, bhāventopi paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:106.1: Aniccato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:106.3: Dukkhato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:106.5: Anattato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:107.1: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:107.3: Dukkhato manasikaroto appaṇihito vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:107.5: Anattato manasikaroto suññato vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:108.9: Jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti—
ps1.5:108.11: “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti viññātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāyāti—
ps1.5:108.14: ye hi keci nekkhammaṃ bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā … pe …
ps1.5:108.16: sabbe te animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:109.4: ye hi keci dukkhaṃ parijānanti, samudayaṃ pajahanti, nirodhaṃ sacchikaronti, maggaṃ bhāventi, sabbe te animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:110.5: Dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṃ pahānapaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:110.9: Imehi catūhākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimutto, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:111.9: Imehi navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimutto, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:112.1: Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:112.3: Kathaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:112.5: Dukkhato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:112.7: Kathaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:112.9: Anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:112.11: Kathaṃ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:113.1: Aniccato manasikaronto nimittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:113.4: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:113.6: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:113.9: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:113.11: Anattato manasikaronto nimittañca pavattañca yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:113.14: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:114.1: Yañca yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ yañca sammādassanaṃ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:114.2: Yañca yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ yañca sammādassanaṃ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
ps1.5:115.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:116.1: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṃ yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:116.2: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṃ yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
ps1.5:117.1: Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:117.2: Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
ps1.5:118.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati?
ps1.5:118.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati?
ps1.5:118.3: Anattato manasikaroto kiṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati?
ps1.5:118.4: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
ps1.5:118.5: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattaṃ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
ps1.5:118.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
ps1.5:119.1: Yā ca muccitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:119.2: Yā ca muccitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
ps1.5:120.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kuto cittaṃ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṃ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:120.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kuto cittaṃ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṃ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:120.3: Anattato manasikaroto kuto cittaṃ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṃ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:120.4: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāti, animitte cittaṃ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:120.5: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāti, appavatte cittaṃ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:120.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittā ca pavattā ca cittaṃ vuṭṭhāti, animitte appavatte nirodhe nibbānadhātuyā cittaṃ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:121.1: Yā ca bahiddhāvuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā ye ca gotrabhū dhammā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:121.2: Yā ca bahiddhāvuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā ye ca gotrabhū dhammā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
ps1.5:123.1: Yā ca dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā yañca magge ñāṇaṃ, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:123.2: Yā ca dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā yañca magge ñāṇaṃ, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
ps1.5:125.1: Katamehi catūhākārehi tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:125.3: Kathaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:125.4: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, dukkhato manasikaroto appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, anattato manasikaroto suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:125.5: Evaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:126.1: Kathaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:126.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:126.3: Evaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:127.1: Kathaṃ abhinīhāraṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:127.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittaṃ abhinīharati, dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena cittaṃ abhinīharati, anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena cittaṃ abhinīharati.
ps1.5:127.3: Evaṃ abhinīhāraṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:128.1: Kathaṃ niyyānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:128.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ niyyāti, dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ niyyāti, anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ niyyāti.
ps1.5:128.3: Evaṃ niyyānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:128.4: Imehi catūhākārehi tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:129.1: Katamehi sattahākārehi tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:129.2: Samodhānaṭṭhena, adhigamanaṭṭhena, paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena, phassanaṭṭhena, abhisamayaṭṭhena.
ps1.5:129.3: Kathaṃ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:129.12: Evaṃ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:130.7: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na paṇidahatīti—
ps1.5:130.9: Evaṃ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:131.5: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na paṇidahatīti—
ps1.5:131.9: Evaṃ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:131.10: Imehi sattahākārehi tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:132.1: Atthi vimokkho, atthi mukhaṃ, atthi vimokkhamukhaṃ, atthi vimokkhapaccanīkaṃ, atthi vimokkhānulomaṃ, atthi vimokkhavivaṭṭo, atthi vimokkhabhāvanā, atthi vimokkhappaṭippassaddhi.
ps1.5:133.2: Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
ps1.5:139.2: Ye tattha jātā anavajjakusalā bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, idaṃ mukhaṃ. #2
ps1.5:140.2: Yaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ, idaṃ vimokkhamukhaṃ.
ps1.5:141.2: Tīṇi akusalamūlāni vimokkhapaccanīkāni, tīṇi duccaritāni vimokkhapaccanīkāni, sabbepi akusalā dhammā vimokkhapaccanīkā, idaṃ vimokkhapaccanīkaṃ. #4
ps1.5:142.2: Tīṇi kusalamūlāni vimokkhānulomāni, tīṇi sucaritāni vimokkhānulomāni, sabbepi kusalā dhammā vimokkhānulomā, idaṃ vimokkhānulomaṃ. #5
ps1.5:143.2: Saññāvivaṭṭo, cetovivaṭṭo, cittavivaṭṭo, ñāṇavivaṭṭo, vimokkhavivaṭṭo, saccavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:144.1: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo tattha cetovivaṭṭo, yattha cetovivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo, yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo tattha cittavivaṭṭo, yattha cittavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:144.2: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo tattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo, yattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:144.3: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo tattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo, yattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:144.4: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo tattha saccavivaṭṭo, yattha saccavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:146.2: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā,
ps1.5:146.4: dutiyassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā,
